sentences: We are seeking a skilled JavaScript Developer with a minimum of 2 years of commercial experience to join our team
You will work remotely and collaborate with a team of developers to create innovative and engaging web applications
The ideal candidate should be proficient in HTML and CSS, with a good understanding of DOM manipulation
Develop new features and maintain existing applications using JavaScript
Collaborate with designers and back-end developers to build interactive and responsive web applications
Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement of development practices
Minimum of 2 years of commercial experience as a JavaScript Developer
Strong proficiency in HTML and CSS
Ability to write clean and maintainable code
Excellent communication skills and ability to work in a team
This is an exciting opportunity to work remotely and collaborate with a team of talented developers to create innovative web applications
If you are a skilled JavaScript Developer with a passion for creating engaging user experiences, we encourage you to apply
Newcastle: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (preferred)
Work Location: Hybrid remote in Newcastle
segment: Develop new features and maintain existing applications using JavaScript
